languages.text: "Идира. Скажи мне. Слышала ли ты вновь голос Теодоры с той стороны?"
"Idira. Tell me: have you heard Theodora's voice again on the other side?"
languages.original_text: "Идира. Скажи мне. Слышала ли ты вновь голос Теодоры с той стороны?"

traits.locale_text: "Idira. Tell me: have you heard Theodora's voice again on the other side?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Idira. Tell me: have you heard Theodora's voice again on the other side?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Idira. Tell me: have you heard Theodora's voice again on the other side?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Idira. Tell me: have you heard Theodora's voice again on the other side?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “伊迪拉，告诉我，你又听到西奥多拉的声音从另一边传来了吗？”
languages.original_text: "Idira. Tell me: have you heard Theodora's voice again on the other side?"

traits.locale_text: “伊迪拉，告诉我，你又听到西奥多拉的声音从另一边传来了吗？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Idira. Dites-moi, avez-vous de nouveau entendu la voix de Théodora de l'autre côté ? »
languages.original_text: "Idira. Tell me: have you heard Theodora's voice again on the other side?"

traits.locale_text: « Idira. Dites-moi, avez-vous de nouveau entendu la voix de Théodora de l'autre côté ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Idira. Dígame: ¿ha vuelto a oír la voz de Theodora proveniente del otro lado?».
languages.original_text: "Idira. Tell me: have you heard Theodora's voice again on the other side?"

traits.locale_text: «Idira. Dígame: ¿ha vuelto a oír la voz de Theodora proveniente del otro lado?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「イディラ、教えてくれ。また天国からシオドーラの声を聞いたのか？」
languages.original_text: "Idira. Tell me: have you heard Theodora's voice again on the other side?"

traits.locale_text: 「イディラ、教えてくれ。また天国からシオドーラの声を聞いたのか？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Idira. Sagt: Habt Ihr Theodoras Stimme wieder auf der anderen Seite gehört?"
languages.original_text: "Idira. Tell me: have you heard Theodora's voice again on the other side?"

traits.locale_text: "Idira. Sagt: Habt Ihr Theodoras Stimme wieder auf der anderen Seite gehört?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Idira. Tell me: have you heard Theodora's voice again on the other side?"

languages.text: "Söylesene İdira, diğer tarafta Theodora'nın sesini tekrar duydun mu?"
languages.original_text: "Idira. Tell me: have you heard Theodora's voice again on the other side?"

traits.locale_text: "Söylesene İdira, diğer tarafta Theodora'nın sesini tekrar duydun mu?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
